clinical_recommendations.clinical_context: Early-stage cervical cancer IA1 without lymphovascular space invasion (LVSI)
clinical_recommendations.recommendation_content: Cervical conization ± pelvic lymph node dissection (with sentinel lymph node mapping)

clinical_recommendations.clinical_context: Early-stage cervical cancer IA1 with LVSI
clinical_recommendations.recommendation_content: Total hysterectomy (Type C) + pelvic lymph node dissection

clinical_recommendations.clinical_context: Early-stage cervical cancer IA2 or IB1
clinical_recommendations.recommendation_content: Radical hysterectomy (Type C) + pelvic lymph node dissection, or radical radiotherapy (external beam + brachytherapy) ± concurrent chemotherapy

clinical_recommendations.clinical_context: Early-stage cervical cancer IB3 or IIA2
clinical_recommendations.recommendation_content: Radical radiotherapy (external beam + brachytherapy) ± platinum-based concurrent chemotherapy

clinical_recommendations.clinical_context: Early-stage cervical cancer IB3 or IIA2
Locally advanced cervical cancer stage IIB-IVA
clinical_recommendations.recommendation_content: Concurrent chemoradiotherapy (external radiotherapy 45-50Gy + brachytherapy) + pembrolizumab (for stage IIIA-IVA only)

clinical_recommendations.clinical_context: Postoperative adjuvant therapy for high-risk factors (lymph node positive, positive margin, parametrial invasion)
clinical_recommendations.recommendation_content: Pelvic external beam radiotherapy + concurrent platinum-based chemotherapy ± brachytherapy

clinical_recommendations.clinical_context: Postoperative adjuvant therapy for intermediate-risk factors (Sedlis criteria)
Postoperative adjuvant therapy for intermediate-risk factors in adenocarcinoma or adenosquamous carcinoma
clinical_recommendations.recommendation_content: Pelvic radiotherapy ± brachytherapy with concurrent chemotherapy

clinical_recommendations.clinical_context: Recurrent or metastatic cervical cancer - local recurrence without prior radiotherapy
clinical_recommendations.recommendation_content: Surgery or individualized radiotherapy + systemic therapy

clinical_recommendations.clinical_context: Recurrent or metastatic cervical cancer - local recurrence after radiotherapy
clinical_recommendations.recommendation_content: Pelvic exenteration or stereotactic body radiotherapy (SBRT)

clinical_recommendations.clinical_context: Recurrent or metastatic cervical cancer - distant metastasis first-line systemic therapy
Recurrent or metastatic cervical cancer - second-line therapy for PD-L1 positive
Recurrent or metastatic cervical cancer - second-line therapy for HER2 positive
Recurrent or metastatic cervical cancer - second-line therapy

biomarker_clinical_significance.clinical_significance: Guides selection of targeted therapy and immunotherapy; predicts treatment efficacy based on biomarker status (e.g., PD-L1 for immunotherapy, HER2 for targeted therapy)
